<script>
$(function() {
	var sizeMode = 0;
	var $visualBox = $('#kv-type2');
	// var $bannerBox = $('.m_content-slider.banners');
	var $kvslide = $('.m_content-slider.kvslide');
	$visualBox.bind('xlider-changed', function(e, v) {
		var index = v.page,
			$visuals = $visualBox.find('article'),
			$visual = $visuals.eq(index),
			$wrap = $('#wrap'),
			headerMode = $visual.data('bright-header') || '',
			brightModes = [];


		$visualBox.css('backgroundColor', $visual.css('backgroundColor'));

		$(window).off('.keyvisual_header');

		$wrap.removeClass('bright-header');

		if (headerMode=='bright-header') {
			$wrap.addClass('bright-header');
		} else if (headerMode.indexOf(',')>-1) {
			brightModes = headerMode.split(',');
			$.each(brightModes, function(i) {
				brightModes[i] = parseInt(brightModes[i], 10);
			});
			sizeMode = -1;
			$(window).on('resize.keyvisual_header load.keyvisual_header orientationchange.keyvisual_header', function() {
				setTimeout(function() {
					var curSizeMode = GALAXY.sizeMode;
					if (sizeMode!=curSizeMode) {
						var isBrightHeader = false;
						for (var i=0; i<brightModes.length; i++) {
							if (brightModes[i]==curSizeMode) {
								isBrightHeader = true;
							}
						}
						$wrap[(isBrightHeader)?'addClass':'removeClass']('bright-header');
						sizeMode = curSizeMode;
						isFirst = true;
					}
				}, 50);
			}).trigger('resize.keyvisual_header');
		}

		setTimeout(function() {
			var page = v.page+1;
			$('#kv-type2 [class*="-prev"]').attr('data-omni', ':home:kv'+ page +'_leftarrow');
			$('#kv-type2 [class*="-next"]').attr('data-omni', ':home:kv'+ page +'_rightarrow');
		}, 110);

	});

	if ( $('#galaxy-mwc').length ) {
		$('#galaxy-mwc .f_container').css('opacity',0)._animate({'opacity':1},{duration: 1650, easing: 'easeInOutQuad', delay: 850});
	}

	$("#kv-type2 a[data-youtube]").on("click", function(e) {
		e.preventDefault();
		var youtube = $(this).data('youtube');
		GALAXY.vodPlayer.show(youtube, this, true);
		$('#layer-youtube').find('h3').remove();
		$('#layer-youtube iframe').attr('title',$(this).data('youtube-title'));
	})

	$(".middle-content .videos article a").not('.no-video').on('click',function(e) {
		e.preventDefault();
		var youtube = $(this).data('youtube');
		GALAXY.vodPlayer.show(youtube, this, true);
		$('#layer-youtube').find('h3').remove();
		$('#layer-youtube iframe').attr('title',$(this).data('youtube-title'));
		$('#layer-youtube iframe').after('<p class="youtube-desc blind">'+$(this).find('.youtube-desc').text()+'</p>');
	});

	$(".galaxy-s20-tvc a.c_btn-player, .galaxy-z-flip-tvc a.c_btn-player").click(function() {
		$('#layer-youtube iframe').attr('title',$(this).data('youtube-title'));
		return false;
	});

	// $bannerBox.bind('xlider-changed', function(e, v) {
	// 	setTimeout(function() {
	// 		var page = v.page+1;
	// 		var $prevBtn = $bannerBox.find('nav>a').eq(0);
	// 		var $nextBtn = $bannerBox.find('nav>a').eq(1);
	// 		if(page == 1){
	// 			$prevBtn.removeClass().addClass('m_btn_type1-prev small');
	// 			$nextBtn.removeClass().addClass('m_btn_type1-next small');
	// 		}else if(page == 2){
	// 			$prevBtn.removeClass().addClass('m_btn_type1-prev small');
	// 			$nextBtn.removeClass().addClass('m_btn_type1-next small');
	// 	}, 110);
	// 		}
	// });

	$kvslide.bind('xlider-changed', function(e, v) {
		var page = v.page;
		var currentSlide = $kvslide.find('article.m_feature-kv').eq(page);

		if(!currentSlide.data('bright-header') || currentSlide.data('bright-header') == undefined) {
			$kvslide.find('nav .m_btn_type2-prev').removeClass().addClass('m_btn_type1-prev');
			$kvslide.find('nav .m_btn_type2-next').removeClass().addClass('m_btn_type1-next');
		}
	});

	GALAXY.load(function () {
		$('.xlider-fake').each(function () {
			var $img = getImageSources($(this).find('img'));
			$(this).find('img').attr('src', $img[GALAXY.sizeMode]);
		});
	});

	function getImageSources($image) {
		var s4 = $image.attr('data-media-s4') || $image.attr('src'),
			s3 = $image.attr('data-media-s3') || s4,
			s2 = $image.attr('data-media-s2') || s3,
			s1 = $image.attr('data-media-s1') || s2;
		return [null, s1, s2, s3, s4];
	}
});
</script>

<script>
// Google Search
window.googleValueCheckInterval = null;
window.__gcse = {
	callback: function() {
		var $cseOpenButton = $('#cseOpenButton'),
			$cseSearchField = $('#cseSearchForm input.gsc-input'),
			$cseSearchDefaultKeyword = 'Galaxy S22 Ultra', //keywoard.
			$resizemode;

		if ( !$cseSearchField.length ) return;

		$cseSearchField.attr('placeholder', 'Search..');

		$cseOpenButton.on('click.openCseSearch', function() {
			var _this = this;
			var resultEl = google.search.cse.element.getElement('cseSearchResultOnly');
			if ( $cseSearchField.val() == '' ) {
				$cseSearchField.val( $cseSearchDefaultKeyword );
			}
			resultEl.execute( $cseSearchField.val() );
			setTimeout(function() {
				_this.style.outline = '';
				$cseSearchField.select();
			}, 600);

			// 검색어 변경시 체크.
			googleValueCheckInterval = setInterval(function () {
		    var resultInfo = $('.gsc-result:first');
			    if (resultInfo.length && !resultInfo.data('isOld')) {
			        resultInfo.data('isOld', true);
			        $('.srch-tab-area a:first').trigger('click');
			    }
			}, 250);
			$('.g-close a').one('click.setInterval', function() {
				clearInterval( googleValueCheckInterval );
			});
		});

		// ie bug
		$('html.ie #gnb').on('click', '.gsc-cursor-page', function() {
			$('#gnb').scrollLeft(0);
		});

		// 검색모드(ALL, images) 변경
		$('.srch-tab-area a').on('click', function() {
			var curIndex = $('.srch-tab-area a').index(this);
			var $tabs = $('#gnb .gsc-control-cse .gsc-tabsArea > div');

			$('.srch-tab-area a').removeClass('current');
			$(this).addClass('current');
			$('.srch-tabs .cur-bg').css('left', $('.srch-tab-area a.current').position().left);
			$tabs.eq(curIndex).trigger('click');
			return false;
		});

		$resizemode = GALAXY.sizeMode;

		$(window).resize(function () {
			if (GALAXY.sizeMode != $resizemode) {
				$('.srch-tab-area a.current').click();
				$resizemode = GALAXY.sizeMode;
			}
		});



	}
};

window.GALAXY&&GALAXY.load(function() {
	var cx = '007367572554865640989:togm7mb0yig';
	var gcse = document.createElement('script');
	var width = document.documentElement.offsetWidth,
		sizeMode = width > 1440 ? 4 : width > 1023 ? 3 : width > 767 ? 2 : 1,
		setMobile = '';

	gcse.type = 'text/javascript';
	gcse.async = true;
	gcse.src = 'https://cse.google.com/cse.js?'+ setMobile +'cx='+ cx;

	var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
	s.parentNode.insertBefore(gcse, s);
});


</script>
